definition.text: Your Governance Address is a Superalgos (SA) Token address generated from within Superalgos, using the Profile Constructor. The tokens you hold in this address confer you Token Power, that you may use from within your User Profile to participate in governance.

paragraphs.text: Your Governance Address is a Superalgos (SA) Token address generated from within Superalgos, using the Profile Constructor. The tokens you hold in this address confer you Token Power, that you may use from within your User Profile to participate in governance.
